org.displaytag.model

Class Column

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.displaytag.model.Column

  • public class Column
extends Object
    Represents a column in a table.
    Version:
    $Revision$ ($Author$)
    Author:
    Fabrizio Giustina

                throws ObjectLookupException,
                       DecoratorException
        Gets the value, after calling the table / column decorator is requested.
        Parameters:
        decorated - boolean
        Returns:
        Object will never be null if ShowNulls has been set to false
        Throws:
        ObjectLookupException - for errors in bean property lookup
        DecoratorException - if a column decorator is used and an exception is thrown during value decoration

      • getChoppedAndLinkedValue

        public String getChoppedAndLinkedValue()
        get the final value to be displayed in the table. This method can only be called after initialize(), where the content is evaluated
        Returns:
        String final value to be displayed in the table
